texts.es: Ana presta servicios de belleza en su propia peluquería, ubicada en la ciudad de Cartagena de Indias, donde habita en condicion de separada, con su hijo de 22 años de edad. Entre la  oferta de servicios de mejoramiento de la imagen personal y profesional, están varios productos como el blowers, cortes de cabello, manicure, pedicure, tinturado, entre otros tratamientos capilares.  Desde al año 2011, cuando inició su negocio, Ana empezó promocionando su oferta entre sus vecinos, ubicados en diversos barrios. Su trabajo lo realiza desde las 8 de la mañana, hasta las 9 de la noche, de martes a domingos, habiendo aplazado el descanso de este dia, para el lunes, que tiene menos clientela. Su meta mas adelante, es lograr acceder a un punto de servicios de mejoramiento de imagenm en un local ubicado en los centros comerciales, pero su mayor desafio es no tener el suficiente capital de trabajo para invertir y hacer que su sueño sea una realidad inmediata. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comrpará productos de peluquería, para prestar el servicio a todo costo y generar nuevas ganancias, Mientras eso ocurre sus indicadores de rentabilidad son no inferior al 30% y posee una liquidez del 2,8%, indicadores que desea mejorar paulatinamente, con su nueva inversion credikiva.
texts.en:
Ana offers beauty services in her own salon, located in the city of Cartagena de Indias. She is separated with a 22-year-old son. Her offerings include personal and professional image improvement and products like blowouts, hair cuts, manicures, pedicures, hair dying, and other hair treatments. 
Since 2011, when she opened her business, Ana has been advertising her services to her neighbors located in several neighborhoods. She works from 8:00 in the morning until 9:00 at night from Tuesday to Sunday, having moved her rest day from this day to Monday since she has fewer clients. Her goal in the future in to have an image improvement center in a store in a mall but her biggest obstacle is the lack of capital to invest and make her dream become a reality in the short term. She is currently applying for a Kiva loan, her first one via Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, to buy salon products so she can charge a higher price and generate a larger income. Meanwhile, she has at least a 30% profit margin and 2.8% liquidity, which are indicators that she hopes to improve gradually with Kiva's investment.

loans.use: to buy beauty products for use and for sale.

loans.name: Jessabel

texts.en:
Jessabel works hard to support her family. Jessabel is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional fishing net.

Jessabel has been in this business for 4 years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional fishing net

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita works hard to support her family. Rosita is widowed and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Rosita requested a PHP 21500 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Rosita has been in this business for 15 years now.

In the future, Rosita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Jirasel

texts.en:
Jirasel is 26 years old, married with one child who is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Jirasel has a weaving clothing business in the Philippines. Jirasel requested a PHP 5000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase materials for her clothing weaving business.

Jirasel has been in this business for 3 years. In the future, Jirasel would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase materials for her weaving clothing business

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Rosita works hard to support her family.

She has a videoke machine rental business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food and fish vending.  Rosita is borrowing PHP 15000 through NWTF to buy spare parts for the maintenance of her videoke machine.

Rosita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 3 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for the maintenance of her videoke machine

loans.name: Semeona

texts.en:
Semeona is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Semeona is 44 years old and has two children who are currently in school.

Semeona has a buy and sell livestock business in the Philippines. Semeona requested a PHP 10000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional livestock to sell.

loans.name: Luz Miryam

texts.es:
4 hijos, un esposo y una gran historia tiene la señora Luz quien inicio con una caja de refrescos y una bolsa de mecato su negocio y con buenas ventas, perseverancia y con 8 créditos en la corporación Interactuar la señora Luz puede darse el gusto de contar con una gran tienda en el sector. 
Luz es realmente una persona que vale la pena prestar, tiene un excelente hábito de pago y gracias a su tienda puede darles apoyo a sus hijas y la menor de ella quiere una cámara para ser una fotógrafa profesional y luz con la ayuda de su tienda se la piensa dar. 
Solicita un crédito el cual la invertirá en surtido de la canasta familiar esperando a mejorar sus ventas y si un día solo tuvo una caja de refrescos y una bolsa de frituras para vender y hoy por hoy tiene toda una tienda (ver foto), con la ayuda de este crédito que podría tener, quizás un gran supermercado?
texts.en:
Señora Luz has four children, a husband, and great history. She began her business with a case of soft drinks and a bag of pastries. With good sales, perseverance, and eight loans from the Interactuar corporation, Señora Luz can enjoy having a great store in the area. Luz is really a person who is worth lending to. She has an excellent record of payments, and thanks to her store she can support her daughters. The youngest wants a camera in order to be a professional photographer, and Luz, with the help of her store, is thinking of giving it to her.

She is applying for a loan that she will invest in products for the basic family food basket, hoping to improve her sales. If one day she had a case of soft drinks and a bag of fritters to sell and today she has a store (see photo), with the help of this loan, what will she be able to have? perhaps a great supermarket?

loans.use: to buy products for the basic family food basket to stock her store and continue growing so that some day she can have a mini-market

loans.name: Judith

texts.es: Judith de 44 años de edad es propietaria de un taller de modisteria y lencería, que inició  desde el año 2011, ofreciendo prendas de vestir a todo costo, y tambien el servicio a la medida cuando su clientela trae consigo tela e inusmos, para que ella diseñe la ropa, de acuerdo a la moda que le soliciten. Su meta mas importante es lograr que sus hijos sean profesionales exitosos y su meta personal es tener su propia marca y lograr el reconocimiento de la misma. En la actualidad su negocio maneja una liquidez del 2,2% y una rentabilidad no menor del 25%, razones por las cuales se ha acercado a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para solicitar un financiamiento que  la ayude a incrementar su capacidad de comprar de contado; este seria su primer credito en la organización con el cual comprará materias primas e insumos de modistería, para fabricar nuevos modelos, a propósito de las fiestas de final de año, que ya se acercan. Con esta inversión responderá con efectividad a encargos que han hecho sus clientes y así su credikiva mejorará sutancialmente su negocio.
texts.en:
Judith, who is 44 years old, is the proprietor of a dressmaking and lingerie workshop, which she set up in the year 2011, offering articles of clothing with full service, as well as made-to-measure service when the customer brings their own fabric and supplies so that she can design the clothing according the the style they request. Her most important goal is to have her children become successful professionals, and her personal goal is to have her own brand and achieve recognition of the same. 

Her business now manages a liquidity of 2.2% and a profitability of no less than 25%, reasons for which she has approached Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to apply for financing that will help her to increase her capacity for buying for cash. This will be her first loan with the organization, and she will use it to buy basic materials and supplies for dressmaking for the purpose of making new designs for the festivals at the end of the year, which are already approaching. With this investment she will respond effectively to the orders that her customers have placed, and thus her Kiva loan will substantially improve her business.

loans.use: to buy basic materials and supplies for dressmaking

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Nueva Alonzo Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “NUEVO ALONZO” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Senkata, está compuesta por diez  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Clara es la Secretaria. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: costura de gorras, venta de ropa, venta de salchipapa, venta de chicharrón (comida tradicional), taller de hornería, venta de detergentes, venta de DVD,s, ayudante de carpintería, venta de picotas, venta de papa.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Clara es integrante, ella indica que hace dos años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de un promotor de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de papas; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de su madre hace varios años, ya que le ayudaba en su negocio familiar, posteriormente decide emprender su negocio independiente. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de papa por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo comercialiazará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella vive en concubinato y tiene seis hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el consultorio que ofrece la institución.

En la imagen se observa que no se encuentran dos socias, las mismas se encontraban en el área de salud. Así mismo esta presente una persona de chaqueta roja que se encuentra en el fondo, ella es la promotora que observa al grupo que apoyó a formar.
texts.en:
A.C. “NUEVO ALONZO” will begin the first cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Centro Focal de Senkata. It is made up of 10 members and is lead by a directive board where Clara is the secretary. The various businesses of the members of the communal association are: sewing hats, clothing sales, salchipapa (type of food) sales, chicharron sales(traditional food), a bakery, detergent sales, DVD sales, carpentry, picota sales (food), potato sales.

The loan that they get will benefit small micro businesses where Clara is a member. She says she's been a member of Pro Mujer for 12 years, joining through the invitation of a promoter from the institution. Right now, she has a business selling potatoes. She says she learned the business from her mother several years ago because she helped in the family business then decided to start her own.

The loan she will get is to increase capital to buy potatoes at wholesale that she acquires from the vendors in the city of La Paz and then sells them in her stall. This manner of work allows her to generate resources to economically support her family. She lives with her husband and six kids. 

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer she says that she likes the advice the institution offers.

*In the photo that two women aren't there, the same were found in the area of health. In addition, The person wearing the red jacket at the back is the promoter of the group. She supports this group which she helped to found.

loans.use: to buy potatoes at wholesale

loans.name: Cynthia

texts.en:
Cynthia is 45 years old and married with two children.

She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Cynthia is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Cynthia has been farming rice for four years and earns additional income from buying and selling rice.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Jean

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Jean works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines and earns additional income from farming rice. Jean is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to  buy ingredients for her food vending business.

Jean has been sustaining her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college .

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Annabel

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Annabel works hard to support her family.

She has a vegetable business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store.  Annabel is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional vegetables like onions and string beans to sell.

Annabel has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional vegetables like onions and string beans to sell

loans.name: Juan Alberto

texts.es:
El señor Juan de 48 años de edad vive con su esposa y tiene dos hijos que depende de él, vive en una comunidad de San Lorenzo valle al sur de Honduras y se dedica desde hace 32 años  al negocio de pesca artesanal, en su actividad el sale todos los días muy temprano al mar a pescar sus productos que luego por las tardes entrega a sus clientes.
Don Juan está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de tres redes para pescar y espera que esta inversión le permita salir adelante con su negocio y mejorar un poco su calidad de vida y la de su familia gracias a la inversión y a su vez hacer crecer más negocio
Su sueño es mejorar su equipo de trabajo y que sus hijos estudien en  la universidad.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Septiembre del 2014.
texts.en:
Señor Juan is 48 years old and lives with his wife. He has two dependent children. He lives in the town of San Lorenzo in a valley in the south of Honduras. 

For 32 years, he has made a living as a small-scale fisherman. He goes out to sea very early every morning to fish, which he then delivers to his customers in the afternoons. 

Juan is requesting the loan to buy three fishing nets. He hopes that this investment will enable him to move forwards with his business and improve he and his family's quality of life a little, as well as grow his business.

His dream is to improve his work equipment and for his children to study at university. 

San Lorenzo, Honduras - September 2014.

loans.use: to buy a fishing net for his business.

loans.name: Lilibeth

texts.es: Lilibeth  de 32 años de edad se dedica a la confeccion y ala venta de queso la venta de queso y articulos mediante guias especializadas. Ella en su condicion de mujer separada de su cónyuge  y madre de 2 hijos decidió genera ingresos para apoyar el sustento de su familia, a través de un negocio. Antriormente se dedicaba al comercio de ropa vendiendo por las calles del municipio y como tenia mucho dinero en sus cuentas por cobrar y no hubo retoro de este a su negocio, pues su clientela nunca pagó, decidió quedarse en su casa, atender a sus hijos y confeccionarla  adicionando la venta de queso de contado y de productos mediante guias especializadas, los cuales para promocionar, no tiene que estar tanto tiempo fuera de su hogar, abandonando la educacion de sus hijos y el cuidado de su hogar.  Su meta es finalizar sus estudios y aumentar los rendimientos de su negocio, para educar a sus hijos con mayor posibilidad de que sean exitosos y ste es su principal desafio en tanto a que es una mujer separada que requiere mucho mas efuerzo para sacarlos adelante. En la actualidad maneja en su negocio una rentabilidad sobre las ventas no menor al 7% y desea incrmentarla. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamineto que hace a la FundaciónMario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará queso en mayor volumen, e insumos para elaborar ropa que ha sido solicitada por su clientela a la medida de su cuerpo y de las fiestas que se acercan , esta inversión le ayudará a aumentar sus ventas y hacer de su credikiva una inversión exitosa.
texts.en:
Lilibeth is 32 years old and makes a living making and selling clothes and selling cheese and other items through specialised channels. As a woman who is separated from her partner and who has two children, she decided to earn money to support her family through a business. 

She previously worked selling clothes in the streets of her town. However, a lot of the money owed to her by customers on credit was never repaid, so she decided to stay at home, look after her children and make clothes. To this she added the sale of cheese and other products in exchange for cash via specialised channels. She doesn't have to spend so much time away from home to promote these products, abandoning her children's education and the housework.  

Her goal is to finish studying and increase her company's returns so that she can educate her children and increase their chance of being successful. This is her primary aim as a separated woman who has to make a lot of effort to support them. 

Her current profit on sales is no less than 7% and she wants to increase this. She is applying for a loan from Kiva which will be her first loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She will use it to buy wholesale cheese and the inputs she needs to make the clothes ordered by her customers and clothing for the upcoming festivities. This investment will help her to boost her sales and make her Kiva loan a successful investment.

loans.use: to buy fabric to make clothes and wholesale cheese.

loans.name: Amelia

texts.es: Amelia es una mujer separada, que tiene 2 hijos en las edades de 30 y 32 años. Ella desde hace 10 años, contó con la oportunidad de comprar un lote en un lado contiguo de su vivienda y decidió construír 2 apartamentos para arrendarlos; con mucho orden su negocio fue creciendo poco a poco,  y hoy  Amelia tiene 6 apartamentos y aun  su fuerte deseo de crecer no se detiene.  Su meta es continuar el ejercicio de la cosntruccion de nuevos inmuebles, pero antes necesita levantar el piso en una de sus casas para arrendarla y ganar aun mas. Esta es la razón por la acual aplica a un credikiva, primer finaciamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará materiales de construccion y baldosas para alcanzar esta meta, pues su mayor desafio es no tener el suficiente dinero ahorrado para lograrlo. Su meta familiar es apoyar la educacion de sus hijos y de sus nietos porque ama a su familia con todo su corazón y haria todo el trabajo que requiera para sacarlos adelante.
texts.en:
Amelia is separated, and has two children aged 30 and 32. Ten years ago, she had the opportunity to buy a plot of land next to her home and decided to build two apartments to rent out. With a great deal of effort, her business grew little by little. Today, she has six apartments and her continued desire to grow knows no bounds. 

Her goal is to continue constructing new buildings. Before that, however, she needs to raise the floor of one of her houses to rent out and earn more. This is why she is requesting a loan from Kiva, which will be her first loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She will use the loan to buy building materials and tiles to achieve her goal, as her biggest challenge is that she doesn't have enough money saved up to do it without the loan. 

Her family goals is to support her children and grandchildren's education, because she loves her family with all her heart and she will work all that she has to to support them.

loans.use: to buy building materials and tiles.

loans.name: Giovana Margarita

texts.es:
Giovana es una persona muy trabajadora, tiene una hija quien es el motor de su vida y por quien día a día lucha para poder sacarla adelante. Desde hace más de 8 años trabaja en una prestigiosa empresa de su ciudad natal, San Martin. Con mucho esfuerzo ha salido adelante a pesar de las adversidades, estudió una profesión y a la vez tenía que cuidar a su hija y trabajar, no ha sido fácil, pero ahora está cosechando la recompensa de tanto esfuerzo.
Giovana quiere que su hija tenga un mejor futuro y que viva de manera cómoda por eso destinará el crédito para poder arreglar su cuarto como pintarrajear las paredes y comprar un televisor, ella está muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva por su generosidad, quiere que ellos sepan que así su hija gozará de mayor bienestar y ella continuará trabajando más tranquila-
texts.en:
Giovana is a very hard-working person. She has a daughter who is her motivation and for whom she fights every day to move forwards. For over eight years, she has worked in a prestigious company in her birth city, San Martin. With a great deal of effort, she has moved forwards despite the adversities. She studied for a profession and at the same time she had to look after her daughter and work. It hasn't been easy, but she is now reaping the rewards of so much effort.

Giovana wants her daughter to have a better future and live comfortably. That is why she will use her loan from Kiva to make improvements to her room, such as paint the walls and buy a television. 

She is very grateful to Kiva lenders for their generosity, and she wants them to know that her daughter's wellbeing will increase and she will continue to work with grater peace of mind.

loans.use: to paint the walls of her room and buy a television for her daughter.

loans.name: Benkan Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe BENKAN est composé de femmes mariées, elles ont en moyenne 44 ans et 5 enfants. Elles vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles dans la ville de Dioïla, préfecture de Dioïla, Région de Koulikoro (deuxième région administrative de la République du Mali).
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et d’amitié. Elles font la restauration, le commerce de condiments et de l’habillement.
Les femmes du groupe BENKAN sont à leur deuxième prêt solidaire.
Dans le but de satisfaire la demande énorme de leurs clientèles, elles font recours à Soro Yiriwaso.
La cliente NAH, première personne de la gauche vers la droite est analphabète, elle est actuellement vendeuse de condiments. Elle compte acheter 2 sacs d’oignon, du poisson fumé, du sel, des cartons de cube Maggi et du grain de néré sur place chez les grossistes. 
La vente se fait en détail et en espèce au marché à une clientèle mixte. Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 40 000Fcfa, qui sera réinvesti dans son activité.
texts.en:
The Benkan group is made up of married women, who average 44 years of age with five children each. They all live in traditional families in the town of Dioïla, in the Dioïla prefecture, which lies in the Koulikoro region (the Republic of Mali's second administrative region). They got to know each other as relatives, neighbors and friends, and they practise restauration and trade in condiments and clothing. With a view to satisfying huge customer demand, the women in this group turned to Soro Yiriwaso and are on their second group loan.

The customer, Nah, who is standing on the far left of the photo, is illiterate and she currently sells condiments. She is planning to buy two sacks of onions, smoked fish, salt, cartons of Maggi stock cubes and "néré" seeds from local wholesalers. She sells her products retail and for cash at the market to a mixed customer base, She expects to make a monthly profit of 40,000FCFA, which will be reinvested in her business.

loans.use: to buy condiments.

loans.name: Rafatou

texts.fr: Âgé de 31ans, madame Rafatou est mariée. Elle n’a pas encore d’enfants. Elle est commerçante et vend des pagnes et bazins à toutes personnes dans une boutique. Son approvisionnement se fait à Lomé chez les grossistes de pagnes et bazins. Son souhait est de satisfaire les clients à chaque demande et elle manque de fonds pour s’approvisionner en marchandises. C’est une ancienne cliente de notre institution et elle opère le sixième crédit chez nous. Avec ce montant, elle va s’acheter des pagnes et bazins et produits cosmétiques pour pouvoir atteindre son objectif : la satisfaction des clients. Dans l’avenir, elle voudrait rendre son activité pérenne et permettre à sa famille de s’épanouir.
texts.en: Rafatou is 31 years old and married. She does not have any children yet. She is a trader and sells "pagnes" (colorful African cloth) and damask fabric to all sorts of people in a shop. She gets her supplies from wholesalers of "pagne" and damask fabric in Lomé, and while she wants to be able to satisfy her customers' every demands, she does not have the funds to get the necessary supplies. She has been a customer of WAGES for a long time and is on her sixth loan. With this loan she is going to buy "pagnes" and damask fabric, as well as cosmetics, so she can achieve her objective to satisfy her customer demand. For the future she would like to make her business sustainable and see her family flourish.

loans.use: to buy pagnes (colorful African cloth) and bazin cloth

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a cooler to stock soft drinks, dairy products and cold meats and repair the leaky roof.

loans.name: Nabiaton Group

texts.fr: Nabiaton est un groupe de quatre(04)femmes battantes qui sont à leur huitième prêt avec ACFIME. Elles sont toutes travailleuses et honorent toujours leurs échéance. Maimouna, la présidente du groupe est mariée et mère de deux(02) enfants. Comme activité, elle fait le commerce des pagnes. Avec ce prêt, Maimouna veux s'approvisionner en pagnes puis qu’avec la fête de Tabaski, elle n'avait plus assez de stock.Avec son  bénéfice elle pourra contribuer à la charge familiale et renforcer son activité commerciale.
texts.en: Nabiaton is a group of four energetic women who are on their eighth loan from ACFIME. They are all hard workers who honor their debts on time. Maimouna, the president of the group, is married and mother to two children. She has a business selling "pagnes" (colorful African cloth). With this loan she would like to get fresh supplies of "pagnes" since she no longer has sufficient stocks owing to the Tabaski celebrations. With the profit she makes she will be able to contribute to the family's expenses and strengthen her business.

loans.use: to buy "pagnes" for resale.

loans.name: Paula Mercedes

texts.es: Paula Mercedes mayor de edad viuda con cuatro hijos de los cuales tres están bajo su responsabilidad, originaria de uno de los municipios de Chinandega ubicado en el occidente del país, se caracteriza por ser una mujer trabajadora responsable y con muchos deseos de superación personal, es administradora y propietaria de su propio negocio el cual consiste en la crianza y destace de cerdos tambien por los fines de semana elabora fritanga donde ofrece tajadas, enchiladas, nacamatales, carne de cerdo asado, pollo asado entre otros mas, sus compras las realiza al contado en comarcas aledañas de su vivienda y en mercados de esta misma localidad, sus ventas son al contado y en algunas ocasiones al crédito, tiene clientes fijos (comerciantes de la localidad)y eventuales, inicia su negocio con fondos propios productos poco antes de que su esposo falleciera para así apoyar a sus hijos y le de mejorar los ingresos de su hogar, este ha sido una fuente de trabajo para ella, su jornada diaria inicia desde muy temprano, a las comunidades aledañas a comprar cerdos al mejor precio para una futura venta y que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos en su hogar, el objetivo de este financiamiento es para invertir en capital de trabajo en la compra de un lote de cerdos para la crianza y venta de estos y sus derivados
texts.en:
Paula Mercedes is a widow with four children in her care.  She is from one of the municipalities of Chinandega in the western part of the country and known for being a hard-working, responsible woman with a great desire to get ahead.  She manages and owns her own business raising pigs and selling pork products.  On the weekends she also makes fried foods such as fried plantain, enchiladas, nacatamales, roast pork, roast chicken and other items.  She buys merchandise in neighboring communities and markets where she lives.  Her sales are in cash basis and sometimes on a credit basis to both fixed and eventual customers.

Paula Mercedes began her business with her own funds just before her husband passed away.  This was so she could support her children and earn more income for the household.  Her work day begins early in the morning when she goes to neighboring communities to buy pigs at the best possible price.  The loan she is requesting is to buy a batch of pigs to raise for future sales.

loans.use: To buy a batch of pigs and raw materials for her food business.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal NUEVA VISION DE URUBAMBA, el banco está ubicado en la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Francisca tiene 38 años de edad tiene 02 hijos y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a trabajar de veterinaria, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a su carrera profesional y de esta manera le permite ayudar a los animalitos que necesitan sus servicios, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta manera seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de jarabes, medicinas entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete  a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Francisca belongs to the Nueva Visión de Urubamba communal bank, located in Urubamba Province, Cusco Department. She is 38 years old and has two children and a partner. 

She alternates her daily activities, making a living working as a vet. She has spent a long time dedicating herself to her professional career, which allows her to help the animals which need her services. She hopes to be able to continue her work so she can keep supporting her family. 

Francisca is requesting the loan to buy syrups, medicine and other items. She is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her loan repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy syrups, medicine and other items.

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal NUEVA VISION DE URUBAMBA, el banco está ubicado en la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
El socio Edgar tiene 38 años de edad tiene 02 hijos y es conviviente, el socio  alterna sus actividades diarias brindando el servicio de transporte urbano, el socio lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este su trabajo el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día  a su trabajo, él socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta manera seguir apoyando a su familia.
El socio  solicita el crédito para realizar el mantenimiento de su carro.
El socio se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete  a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Edgar belongs to the Nueva Visión de Urubamba communal bank, located in Urubamba Province, Cusco Department. He is 38 years old and has two children and a partner. 

He alternates his daily activities, working providing urban transport services. He has spent a long time making a living in this job, which is going well thanks to the effort he puts into his work every day. Edgar hopes to be able to keep working so he can continue supporting his family. 

Edgar is requesting the loan to maintain his car. He is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her loan repayments on time.

loans.use: to maintain his car.

loans.name: Conchita

texts.en:
Conchita is 55 years old and married with four children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a charcoal retailing business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more sacks of charcoal to re-sell.

Conchita has borrowed and repaid 23 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the charcoal retailing business for 10 years and earns additional income from buying and selling vegetables and farming rice.

She aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of charcoal to resell

loans.name: Ave

texts.en:
Ave is 52 years old and married with 10 children, five of whom are in school.

Ave works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional additional items like dozens of eggs, sugar milk, noodles, etc.

Ave has borrowed and repaid 16 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and earns additional income from buying and selling vegetables and raising goats.

Ave aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional additional items like dozens of eggs, sugar milk, noodles, etc

loans.name: Rosario Del Carmen

texts.es: Rosario de 30 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus 2 hijos los cuales apoya para que estudien ya que desea que se superen. Ella es una mujer que gracias a su esfuerzo ha logrado sacar adelante a sus hijos con el apoyo de su compañero de vida y su negocio de venta de tortillas y queso fresco, además cuenta con una pequeña tienda que se encuentra instalada en su vivienda desde hace 7 años. Rosario desea repellar las paredes de su vivienda, además desea instalar balcones en su vivienda, por lo que solicita un crédito con FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, grava y balcones para repellar las paredes e instalar balcones en las ventanas de su vivienda. Agradece el apoyo que recibió en el pasado lo cual le ha permitido ir mejorando su vivienda poco a poco.
texts.en:
Rosario is 30 years old and lives in her own home with her partner and two children, who she supports to study as she wants them to succeed. She is a woman who, thanks to her efforts, has managed to support her children with the help of her partner and her business selling tortillas and fresh cheese. She has also had a small shop located in her home for seven years. 

Rosario wants to plaster her walls and install balconies in her home, which is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in cement, gravel and balconies to plaster the walls and install balconies in the windows of her home. She is grateful for the support he received in the past, which has enabled her to improve her home little by little.

loans.use: to buy cement, gravel, and balconies to plaster the walls and install balconies in the windows of her home.

loans.name: Jose Napoleon

texts.es:
Jose es padre de familia de un maravilloso niño, quien es el motor de su vida y por quien día a día se esfuerza para poder brindarle un mejor futuro. Desde muy joven apoyó a sus padres en el negocio de venta de comidas, ahora que ya tiene su hijo él ha emprendido su propio negocio del mismo rubro y con las innovadoras ideas que tiene cree que le está yendo bien, ya que es una persona muy responsable, trabajadora y siempre actúa de manera correcta.
Jose quiere mejorar su negocio para brindar una mejor atención a los clientes, por ello destinará el crédito para comprar un conservador de alimentos, él está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva por su generosidad ya que gracias a eso su negocio mejorará, sus clientes se sentirán más contentos y sus ingresos se incrementarán. Más adelante espera ver a su hijo convertido en un excelente profesional.
texts.en:
Jose is the father of a wonderful son who is his motivation in life.  He does all he can to give his son the best possible future.  From a very young age, Jose supported his parents in their food business and now that he has a son he has started his own business, which is going well for him thanks to his innovative ideas.  He is a very responsible, hard-working person who always does the right thing.

Jose wants to improve his business in order to provide better customer service.  He will use the loan to buy a refrigerator.  He is very grateful to Kiva lenders for their generosity because thanks to them his business will improve.  His customers will be happier and his income will increase.  In the future he hopes to see his son become an excellent professional.

loans.use: To buy a refrigerator for his business.

loans.name: Emilio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal NUEVA VISION DE URUBAMBA, el banco está ubicado en la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
El socio Emilio tiene 47 años de edad  y es soltero, el socio  alterna sus actividades diarias vendiendo helados a todos sus clientes que le solicitan, el socio lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día  a su trabajo, él socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta manera seguir apoyando a su familia.
El socio  solicita el crédito para la compra de helados.
El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete  a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Emilio belongs to the Nueva Visión de Urubamba communal bank, located in Urubamba Province, Cusco Department.

Emilio is 47 years old and is single. He alternates his daily activities, selling ice cream to all his customers. He has worked in this business for a long time, and it is going well thanks to the effort he makes every day in his job. He wants to keep working so he can continue to support his family.

Emilio is requesting the loan to buy ice cream. He is grateful for the loan and is committed to making his loan repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy ice cream.

loans.name: Edelyn

texts.en:
Edelyn is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy additional materials for the maintenance of her fishing boat. 

Edelyn has been in this business for five years. She earns more income from direct selling Natasha products.

Edelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for the maintenance of her fishing boat

loans.name: Helina

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Helina works hard to support her family.

She has a welding shop business in the Philippines and earns additional income from her vulcanizing shop. Helina is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF to buy additional materials like welding rods, steel bars, aluminum, etc for her welding shop business.

Helina has been sustaining her business activities through her past 13 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional materials like welding rods, steel bars, and aluminum.

loans.name: Albertina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “PADRE URRACA”; la socia continua trabajando para una empresa pública y a la compra y venta de terrenos, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de un electrodoméstico para su casa.
La socia agradece el préstamo mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “PADRE URRACA” communal bank. She continues to work for a public agency and buying and selling land. She has had this business for a long time and it is going well for her thanks to the hard work she puts into her business every day. She wants to be able to keep working to continue supporting her family in this way.  

She is asking for a loan to buy an appliance for her home. She is thankful for the loan and committed to making her payments on schedule.

loans.use: to buy an appliance for her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To renovate her house by painting and reinforcing the walls.

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
As a married parent of one child, Marivic works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell of rice business in the Philippines and earns additional income from manicure and pedicure services. Marivic is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy additional sacks of rice to sell. 

Marivic has been sustaining her business activities through her past 10 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting, wood and nails to change the roof on her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy school supplies for his youngest daughter.

loans.name: Marinnho

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “PADRE URRACA”; el socio tiene 34 años de edad tiene 01 hijo y es casado, él socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de snack,el socio vende hamburguesas, gaseosas entre otros, él socio a la es docente en una de las universidades de la ciudad del Cusco, el socio  lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, el socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
EL socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de gaseosas, galletas entre otros.
El socio agradece el préstamo mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “PADRE URRACA” communal bank. He is 34 years old, has 1 son and is married. He alternates his daily activities with his snack business. He sells hamburgers, soda and more. He sells to the staff of a university in the city of Cuzco. He has had this business for some time and it is going well for him thanks to the hard work he puts into his business every day. He wants to keep working to support his family in this way. 

He is asking for the loan to buy sodas, cookies and more. He is grateful for the loan and he is also committed to making his payments according to the schedule.

loans.use: to buy sodas, cookies and more.

loans.name: Omar Jimmy

texts.es:
Omar es un joven soltero, emprendedor, tiene 21 años y trabaja como empleado en una empresa de su ciudad natal, Parcona. Es una persona con muchos deseos de superación. Cada mañana Omar despierta con el pensamiento que ese día será mejor que el anterior y es por ello que se esfuerza al máximo para lograr con éxito sus objetivos trazados.
Omar tiene muchos deseos de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, es por ello que destinará el crédito comprar un televisor y así disfrutar de sus momentos libres en familia. Él está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva por su generosidad, quiere que ellos sepan que con esto su calidad de vida mejorará y seguirá luchando para ofrecer un futuro mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
Omar is a single young man. He is 21 years old and works as an employee in a business in his native city, Parcona. He is a person who really wants to get ahead. Every morning, Omar wakes up with the thought that this day will be the better than the last and that is why he works as hard as he can to achieve the goals he has set. 

Omar really wants to improve his family's quality of life. That is why he will use the loan to buy a television and enjoy free time with his family. He is very grateful to the Kiva lenders for their generosity. He wants them to know that with this, his quality of life will improve and he will keep fighting to offer a better future to his family.

loans.use: to buy an appliance ( a television) to furnish his house.

loans.name: Ana Elizabeth

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “PADRE URRACA”; la socia Ana Elizabeth tiene 61 años de edad es casada y tiene 02 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de maíz, la socia es agricultora, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de semillas y abono.
La socia agradece el préstamo mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
The member is part of the PADRE URRACA communal bank. Ana Elizabeth is 61 years old, married, and has 2 children. She alternates her daily chores with her business selling corn. She is a farmer, and has done this work for a good while, which is going well for her due to the determination she puts into her business every day. She wants to be able to continue working so as to continue supporting her family. 

She asks for a loan to purchase seed and fertilizer.

She is thankful for the loan through this platform and in the same way promises to make the payments as scheduled.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Frit B

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “PADRE URRACA”; el socio  Frit B tiene 62 años de edad  y es casado, él socio alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose al negocio de carpinteria, el socio elabora diferentes tipos de trabajos como camas, muebles entre otros, él socio  lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, el socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
EL socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de madera.
El socio agradece el préstamo mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the PADRE URRACA communal bank. Frit B is 62 years old and married. He alternates his daily chores with his carpentry business. He makes different sorts of things such as beds and furniture among other things. He has worked in this business for a good while and it is going well thanks to the determination he puts into his business every day. He wants to be able to continue working so that he can continue supporting his family.

He asks for the loan to purchase wood.

He is grateful for the loan through this platform and also promises to make the payments on the established schedule.

loans.use: to purchase wood.

loans.name: Nidia Mercedes

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “PADRE URRACA”; la socia Nidia tiene 35 años de edad es casada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de productos de belleza como cremas, perfumes, colonias entre otros,  la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de perfumes para su negocio.
La socia agradece el préstamo mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the PADRE URRACA communal bank. Nidia is 35 years old and married. She alternates her daily chores with her business selling beauty products such as creams, perfumes, and colognes among others.  She has worked in this business for a good while, which is going well for her thanks to the determination she puts into her business every day. She wants to continue working so that she can continue supporting her family.

She asks for a loan to purchase perfumes for her business.

She is grateful for the loan through this platform and also promises to make the payments on the established schedule.

loans.use: to purchase perfumes for her business.

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “PADRE URRACA”; la socia Felicitas  alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de productos de belleza como cremas, perfumes, colonias entre otros,  la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, a la vez la socia trabaja en un estudio contable, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de perfumes ,cremas entre otros para su negocio.
La socia agradece el préstamo mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the PADRE URRACA communal bank. Felicitas alternates her daily chores with her business selling beauty products such as creams, perfumes, and colognes among others.  She has worked in this business for a good while, which is going well for her thanks to the determination she puts into her business every day, she also works in an accounting firm. She wants to continue working so that she can continue supporting her family.

She asks for a loan to purchase perfumes and creams, among other things, for her business.

She is grateful for the loan through this platform and also promises to make the payments on the established schedule.

loans.use: to purchase perfumes and creams, among others, for her business.

loans.name: Marlyn

texts.en:
Marlyn is 48 years old, married, and has two children.  

She is in the agricultural business, farming vegetables in the Philippines. Marlyn requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of fertilizer and other farm supplies.

Marlyn has been farming vegetables for four years now, and has borrowed 14 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Marlyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of fertilizer and other farm supplies

loans.name: Dominga

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “PADRE URRACA”; la socia Dominga tiene 43 años de edad es casada y tiene 03 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de autopartes de autos como parabrisas, faros entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de parabrisas entre otros.
La socia agradece el préstamo mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the PADRE URRACA communal bank. Dominga is 35 years old, married, and has 3 children. She alternates her daily chores with her business selling car parts such as windshields and headlights among others.  She has worked in this business for a good while, which is going well for her thanks to the determination she puts into her business every day. She is a responsible and determined woman, being in this way that she gets her family ahead.  

She asks for a loan to purchase perfumes for her business.

She is grateful for the loan through this platform and also promises to make the payments on the established schedule.

loans.use: to purchase a windshield among others.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “PADRE URRACA”; el socio  Manuel tiene 68 años de edad   es casado y tiene 03 hijos, él socio alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose al negocio de venta de autopartes para autos, el socio vende lo que son parabirsas,faros,llantas entre otros, él socio  lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, el socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
EL socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de faros, parabrisas entre otros.
El socio agradece el préstamo mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the PADRE URRACA communal bank. Manuel is 68 years old, married, and has 3 children. He alternates his daily chores with his business selling spare parts for cars.  He sells things such as windshields, headlights, and tires, among others. He has worked in this business for a good while, which is going well for him thanks to the determination he puts into his business every day. He wants to continue working so that he can continue supporting his family.

He asks for a loan to purchase headlights and windshields among other things.

He is grateful for the loan through this platform and also promises to make the payments on the established schedule.

loans.use: to purchase headlights and windshields among others.

loans.name: Anahis

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “PADRE URRACA”; la socia Anahis tiene 20 años de edad  y es soltera, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de autopartes de autos como parabrisas, faros entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta manera salir adelante.
La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de parabrisas y faros.
La socia agradece el préstamo mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the PADRE URRACA communal bank. Anahis is 20 years old and is single. She alternates her daily chores with her business selling spare parts for cars such as windshields and headlights among others.  She has worked in this business for a good while, which is going well for her thanks to the determination she puts into her business every day. She wants to continue working so that she can get ahead.

She asks for a loan to purchase windshields and headlights.

She is grateful for the loan through this platform and also promises to make the payments on the established schedule.

loans.use: to purchase windshields and headlights.

loans.name: Norvie

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Norvie works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening and pre-paid mobile load. Norvie is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to buy additional items to sell like spices, eggs, canned goods, soap, coffee, etc for her general store business.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Norvie has been sustaining her business activities through her past eight loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell like spices, eggs, canned goods, soap, coffee, etc

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is 39 years old and married with five children, three of whom are in school.

She earns a living by farming vegetables in the Philippines. Rosalinda is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to purchase seeds and fertilizer for her farm.

Rosalinda has been farming vegetables for 13 years and also earns additional income from selling vegetables.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to  build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer for her farm

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is 58 years old and married with six children, three of whom are in school.

She earns a living by pig fattening in the Philippines. Rosalinda is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to buy additional sacks of feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Rosalinda has been pig fattening  for eight years, and also earns additional income from buying and selling fish and dried fish.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is 49 years old and has four children.  She is married, and has two children who are in school.

She is in the agricultural business, farming vegetabes in the Philippines. Virginia requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy additonal fertilizer.

Virginia has been farming vegetables for 20 years now, and has borrowed 26 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Virginia would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additonal fertilizer

loans.name: Señor De Ecce Homo Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEÑOR DE ECCE HOMO, el banco está ubicado en el departamento de Cusco.
La socia Cirila tiene 50 años de edad tiene 05 hijos y es separada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa, la socia vende de forma ambulatoria a todo sus clientes que le solictan, la socia lleva años dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de casacas, chompas entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
Las socias que salen en la foto adjunta pidieron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión por motivos de trabajo.
Los demás socios se dedican a la venta de artesania, compra y venta de llaveros, trabajadores independientes.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the SEÑOR DE ECCE HOMO communal bank. The bank is located in Cusco department.

Cirila is 50 years old, has 5 children, and is separated. She alternates her daily chores with her business selling clothing. She sells it as a street vendor to all the customers who ask for it. She has worked for years in this business, which is going well for her thanks to the determination that she puts into her business each day.  She wants to be able to continue working so that she can continue supporting her family.

She is asking for the loan to purchase jackets and sweaters, among other things.

She is grateful for the granted loan and promises to make the established payments.

The members who are in the attached photo asked for permission to arrive to the meeting late because of work. 

The other members work selling arts and crafts, buying and selling key chains and are independent workers.

loans.use: to purchase jackets and sweaters among other things.

loans.name: Ada

texts.en:
Ada is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buy and sell vegetables business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy additional vegetables to sell.

Ada has been in this business for 10 years. Ada earns more income from a general store.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Ada has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family in the future.

loans.use: To buy additional vegetables to sell

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, two of whom in school. Arlene works hard to support her family.

She has a business making and selling curtains in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening. Arlene is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to  buy additional items use for making curtains like fabric, thread, and a sewing machine.

Arlene has been sustaining her business activities through her past nine loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items use for making curtains like fabric, thread and sewing machine

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
Leonora is a 44-year-old married woman with two children who are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Leonora has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 19,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional items like snack foods, candies, biscuits, noodles, soft-drinks, and detergent soap to sell.

Leonora has been in this business for five years. In the future, Leonora would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Cherry

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, three of whom in school, Cherry works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from fish vending. Cherry is borrowing PHP 23,000 through NWTF to buy additional fishing net for her fishing business.

Cherry has been sustaining her business activities through her past 11 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional fishing net

loans.name: Lilibeth

texts.en:
Lilibeth works hard to support her family. Lilibeth is married and has a business selling frozen foods in the Philippines.

Lilibeth requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more packs of frozen foods to sell to her customers.

Lilibeth has been in this business for three years now.

In the future, Lilibeth would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more packs of frozen foods to sell to her customers

loans.name: Melvin

texts.en:
Melvin describes himself as a “winner by nature”, because everything he does, he does with faith and joy. He happily tends to his avocado orchard for the benefit of his family.  He came from the jungles of Peru to the coast with his family, and began to grow corn and alfalfa in the Chao Valley in northern Peru. In the last ten years, when his father passed down to him their family farm, he started to plant organic avocados. 

He works hard to improve his organic crops and is undergoing Fairtrasa’s farmer-development training programs. He wants to send his children to school and to provide them a better future. His loan will help him buy organic compost to increase yields and make his avocado plants stronger and more fruitful.

loans.use: to purchase organic compost for his avocado orchard

loans.name: Susana

texts.en:
Susana is a 51-year-old small-scale avocado grower. Because she was widowed at a young age, she raises her two daughters by herself. She lives in Chao, a valley on Peru's northern coast. Like other growers in her community, she tries to improve her family’s income by focusing on organic farming.

Susana is dedicated to cultivating organic avocados. She explains that it is not only important to gain money from selling avocados, but to develop high-quality fruit. She believes this will improve her livelihood so that she can take care of her family, including her grandchild (in the photo with Susana) for the long-term. 

Susana needs $700 to buy organic fertilizers that will improve her avocado farm.

loans.use: to pay for organic fertilizer for her organic avocado orchard

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline works hard to support her family. She is married, and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Evangeline requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients like meat, beans, fish, vegetables, spices, etc. for her business.

She has been in this business for five years now.

Evangeline would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like meat, beans, fish, vegetables, spices, etc.

loans.name: Emely

texts.en:
Emely is 25 years old and married with three children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a buy and sell charcoal in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

Emely has borrowed and paid 22 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the buy and sell charcoal for two years and also earns an income from a general store.

She aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Edelyn

texts.en:
Edelyn is a live-in partner woman with one child. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Edelyn is 29 years old, and has one child who is in school.

Edelyn has a bicycle transport business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 14,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase an additional bicycle unit for her business.

Edelyn has been in this business for two years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase an additional bicycle unit

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
Elsa is 57 years old, and married with four children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Elsa runs a general store in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

Elsa has been in this business for four years, and sells a variety of items such as milk, coffee, juice, canned goods, biscuits, cooking oil, etc. 

In the future, Elsa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries

loans.name: Estrella

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Estrella works hard to support her family.

She has a business making hollow blocks in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store and raising pigs. Estrella is borrowing PHP 50,000 through NWTF to buy additional items like cement, sand, gravel, etc. for her making hollow blocks business.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Estrella has been sustaining her business activities through her past 40 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: To buy additional items like cement, sand, gravel, etc.

loans.name: Metropolitana  (Portoviejo) Group

texts.es:
En las afueras de Portoviejo vía a la ciudad de  Manta encontramos la ciudadela  Metropolitana, lugar donde se reúnen cada quince días las socias del Grupo de Crédito Metropolitana.
Este es un grupo de personas que decidieron unirse hace tiempo atrás y formar este Banco Comunal que les ha servido de mucho ya que con los créditos, ellos han podido mejorar sus pequeños negocios que hasta la fecha tienen. Ellos se dedican a diversas actividades tales como agricultura, comercio en general, servicios, entre otras actividades.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la señora Ana, tiene 40 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 15 y 11 años que estudian en colegio. Su marido es mecánico.
Doña Ana como buena esposa realiza el crédito para ayudarle a su esposo el cual tiene un taller mecánico donde realizan diversos trabajos como arreglos en motores y soldaduras, pintada y varios trabajos más en cualquier tipo de vehículos, el trabaja con la ayuda de un operario,  él trabaja dentro de su taller y en ocasiones se desplaza a otros lugares donde así lo requieran sus clientes, el allí también vende aceites, grasas y varios repuestos que necesita para sus trabajos. Su esposo lleva más de 30 años dedicado a esta actividad con la cual saca adelante a su familia. 
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar aceites, refacciones y repuestos que necesita su marido para sus trabajos. Este es su primer ciclo  en el Grupo de Crédito y le gusta porque los  créditos son rápidos. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en: In the outskirts of Portoviejo, on the way to the city of Manta, we find the Metropolitana Citadel. This is where the members of the Credit Group Metropolitana meet up every two weeks. This is a group of people, who decided to join some time ago and form this Communal Bank, which has been very useful because with the loans they have been able to improve their small businesses. They work in different jobs, such as agriculture, commerce, services, among others. One of the members is Ana. She is 40 years old, married, and has two children, who are 15 and 11 years old, and who go to school. Her husband is a mechanic. As a good wife, Ana is requesting the loan to help her husband, who has a car repair shop where they do different jobs such as repairing motors, welding, painting and many more jobs for any type of vehicle. He works with the help of an assistant. He works in his shop, and at times he drives to other places if his customers need so. He also sells oils, grease and many spare parts that he needs for his jobs. Ana's husband has worked in this job for more than 30 years, and with it he supports his family. She will use this loan to buy oils, spare parts and replacement parts that her husband needs for his jobs. This is her first loan cycle in the Credit Group and she likes it because the loans are fast. Her dream is to give her family all the best.

loans.use: to buy oils, replacement parts and spare parts.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 59 years old and married with three children. For the past three years, she has been a rice farmer in the Philippines and she also earns additional income from selling vegetables and raising pigs. 

Evelyn is requesting a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of fertilizer and other farm supplies. She is working tirelessly toward attaining her goal of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and farm supplies

texts.en:

Ruth is requesting a 19,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs. In the future, she would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs

Carlita would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.name: Sergei

texts.ru:
Благодаря предыдущей сумме, полученной от КИВА, Сергей сделал хорошее отопление в теплицах, смог значитльно увеличить свой доход в этом году. Он также приобрел грузовое авто — Газель, теперь может вывозить продукцию для сбыта самостоятельно.
В этот раз дополнительная финансовая помощь в размере 40 000 гривен понадобилась Сергею для того, чтобы закупить удобрения, пленку, семена, а также металл на котел. На эту сумму Сергей сможет закупить все необходимое для следующего сезона, а также переделать отопительный котел, сделав его мощнее и экономнее.
texts.en:
Thanks to the previous loan received from Kiva, Sergei has put good heating in his greenhouses and has been able to increase his profits this year. He also purchased a truck, a Gazelle, which has allowed him to transport his goods for sale by himself.

This time, Sergei needs additional financial support of 40,000 griven to purchase fertilizers, plastic film, seeds and metal for the heating boiler. With this amount he will be able to buy everything he needs for the next season, as well as to fix up the heating boiler, which will make it more powerful and energy-efficient.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seeds, plastic covering, and metal for the heating boiler for his greenhouses

La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de venta de bebidas como cervezas y gaseosas, la socia lleva años dedicándose  a este negocio el cual le v a bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día  a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando parta de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
 La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cervezas.
La socia se siente agradecida con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a pagar las cuotas.

She has years of experience in this business, which is going well for her thanks to the effort she puts into it every day.  She wants to be able to keep on working so she can continue to support her family.
